attributes.action: Instigate a fully independant appraisal of the state of the NHS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We read so much about increased spending on the NHS, we read so much about increased numbers of Nurses and Doctors, we read about shorter waiting lists. But these statistics alone do not give us a realistic view of the state of the NHS at the moment and in no way do these figures alone justify current NHS policy. What has the extra money been spent on? What has been the effect of this? Where have the new Nurses and Doctors recruited to? What has been the effect of this?
Numbers alone mean nothing. The messages we get from Doctors and Nurses at the front line of the health service conflict with the implied improvements the figures present.
We need a more meaningful assesment of
the state of the NHS and we need it yesterday!
